name: 鄭麗玲
objective:
文化史課程以台灣各地的文化變遷為主。本課程授課內容，是透過物質生活 (衣、食、住、行)，集體生活 (社會、政治組織)，精神生活 (文學、藝術、哲學、宗教信仰) 等之介紹，讓學生對台灣文化有更進一步的認識與了解。

The course of History and Culture mainly focuses on the evolution in terms of culture that takes place in every part of Taiwan. The contents of this course including the introduction of material life (clothing, food, housing and transportation), collective life (society, politics, and organization), and spiritual life (literature, art, philosophy and religious belief). Students will obtain further cognition and acquaintance about Taiwanese culture. The teaching mode is by giving students a lecture orally, and students have to discuss and hand in written reports. The teaching style is more vivacious.

scorePolicy:
** 所有作業皆在北科 i 學園 PLUS 系統繳交，以系統設定繳交期限為準 **
1. 每位修課同學皆需解說一段講義內容，在當週上課前一天，上傳雲端作業區 —「作業 (一) 講義導讀」。其中需查考的名詞 (可能為專有名詞、人名、地點、事件) 進行查找，課堂 3 分鐘導讀以內容摘要為主。
2. 出席、課堂討論、作品、作業 70%
3. 紙筆測驗 30%
